user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and secure access management for the self-service banking portal.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication mechanism allowing customers to log in securely using multi-factor authentication (MFA). Ensure secure password storage, session management, and encryption of all sensitive data. Implement policies for session timeouts, account recovery, and audit logging of login events, following industry security and regulatory standards.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and User Experience
epics.summary: Design a customized dashboard that presents user-specific banking information and service options.
epics.description: Create an intuitive and data-driven dashboard that offers personalized insight into a user's accounts, banking products, and services. The dashboard should display actionable widgets such as account summaries, recent activity, personalized product offers, and alerts. Ensure the interface is modern, responsive, and accessible across all supported devices.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open accounts and manage service modifications through guided workflows.
epics.description: Develop interactive workflows that allow users to request new accounts or update existing banking services. The workflows should include form validations, document uploads, progress tracking, and dynamic eligibility checks. Prioritize minimal steps and clear guidance for customers, ensuring all submissions are validated and routed to appropriate backend systems.

epics.title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
epics.summary: Provide real-time notifications and progress visibility for customer requests.
epics.description: Implement a modular notification system to inform users about the status of their applications and service requests. Enable real-time updates via in-portal notifications and email messages triggered by key status changes. Include a unified tracker for reviewing the full history of requests and their current status in the user dashboard.

epics.title: Document Upload and Verification System
epics.summary: Allow secure file uploads and verification for account and service requests.
epics.description: Build a secure and user-friendly document management feature that supports the upload of identity and supporting documents for compliance verification. The system should perform format validation, virus scanning, and encryption upon upload. Provide staff with controlled access for verification and integrate with backend services for validation status updates.

epics.title: Save Progress and Resume Applications
epics.summary: Enable users to save incomplete forms and resume from where they left off.
epics.description: Implement an application persistence mechanism allowing users to save unfinished forms or processes and return to them later without data loss. Ensure saved data is encrypted and stored securely within session-agnostic storage. Provide clear guidance for resuming pending applications across devices while maintaining the consistency of partial submissions.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking Systems
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking infrastructure to ensure accurate data exchange.
epics.description: Establish real-time integration points between the self-service portal and the bankâ€™s core systems via secure APIs or middleware. Handle synchronization of account data, service requests, and user credentials with strong transaction handling and error recovery. Maintain local caching and replication for optimal portal performance and availability.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement RBAC to enforce appropriate access levels across customers and internal users.
epics.description: Develop a comprehensive role-based access system that ensures users only see and interact with data and services relevant to their permissions. Establish different roles for customers, administrators, and service operators. Include features for scalable role management, modification auditing, and compliance enforcement with regulatory data standards.

epics.title: Responsive Multi-Device Design
epics.summary: Deliver a responsive web interface ensuring consistent user experience across all devices.
epics.description: Design the portal using a mobile-first responsive approach that delivers consistent aesthetics and usability across desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. Utilize adaptive layouts, optimized content delivery, and cross-browser compatibility. Ensure accessibility features for visually impaired users and compliance with WCAG guidelines.

epics.title: Comprehensive Audit Trail and Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain detailed logs of user activities and interactions for compliance and analytics.
epics.description: Implement a secure audit trail capturing all significant customer and system interactions. Enable administrators to generate detailed reports for compliance, fraud detection, and operational evaluation. Ensure all logs are immutable, time-stamped, and stored securely to meet audit and governance requirements.

user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication for user login
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Multi-factor authentication involving a password and a second factor such as a mobile app or SMS code.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User must successfully authenticate using both a password and a second factor.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a valid password, When the user inputs the correct second factor, Then the user should be successfully authenticated.

user_stories.title: Ensure secure storage of user passwords
user_stories.description: As a system, I want to store user passwords securely, so that sensitive data is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Passwords must be hashed using a strong one-way hashing algorithm, such as bcrypt.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Passwords should never be stored in plain text and must be encrypted before storage.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user registration, When the user creates a password, Then the password should be hashed and stored securely.

user_stories.title: Implement session management policies
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my session to be managed securely, so that unauthorized access is prevented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sessions must timeout after a period of inactivity and require re-authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User sessions should automatically expire after a defined period of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an active session, When the session remains idle for the specified duration, Then the session should expire and require re-authentication.

user_stories.title: Implement audit logging for login events
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to audit login events, so that security incidents can be traced.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: All login events must be logged with timestamp, user ID, and IP address.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Each login event should be recorded with the necessary details for auditing purposes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a login attempt, When the user logs in, Then the event should be logged with timestamp, user ID, and IP address.

user_stories.title: Display user-specific account summaries
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a summary of my accounts, so that I can quickly view my banking status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Account summaries should include balances, recent transactions, and alerts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should see an accurate summary of their accounts upon logging into the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When the dashboard loads, Then the user should see a summary of all their accounts with current balances and recent transactions.

user_stories.title: Present personalized product offers
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see personalized product offers, so that I can find relevant banking services quickly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Offers must be tailored based on user profile and transaction history.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should see product offers that are relevant to their demographics and banking behavior.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When the dashboard loads, Then the user should see personalized product offers.

user_stories.title: Ensure dashboard is responsive and accessible
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive dashboard interface, so that I can access it on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Layout must adapt to different screen sizes, and interface elements must be accessible as per WCAG standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should function seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When the user accesses the dashboard, Then the interface should adapt for usability and maintain accessibility features.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable new account request through guided workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to request a new account through a guided workflow, so that the process is simple and clear.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow includes form validations, progress tracking, and final submission to backend systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be able to complete a new account request with guided steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the new account request workflow, When the user follows the guided steps, Then the account request should be processed and tracked.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
user_stories.title: Support service modification requests through workflows
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my banking services through guided workflows, so that my requests are handled efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows must validate input and ensure minimal steps for completion.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be able to request service modifications with minimal and clear steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a service modification request workflow, When the user follows the steps, Then the service modification should be processed and validated.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Management Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement document uploads in workflows
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload required documents in workflows, so that my requests are processed without delays.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Document uploads should support validations and secure storage.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be able to upload required documents securely during workflow steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the upload requirement in a workflow, When the user uploads a document, Then the document should be validated and stored securely.
